entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
